alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Plymouth, central Bristol, northern Newport, northeastern Kent, southeastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near East Providence to near Scituate. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and tropical downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, New Bedford, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Plymouth, Taunton, East Providence, Coventry, Dartmouth, West Warwick, Johnston, Bristol, Middleborough, Wareham, Somerset, Barrington, Swansea and Tiverton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent
